subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! 11 U.S. Troops Killed In Iraq
body:
U.S. military announces the deaths of 11 U.S. troops, including five 
soldiers killed in a single roadside bomb that also killed three Iraqi 
civilians and an interpreter.











Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
